entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Shelburne
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:58 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Mono Centre 11:00 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
Temperature: -8.7°C

Humidity: 83 %

Dewpoint: -11.0°C
Wind: WSW 27 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few clouds. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 5:51 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
